title: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing strawberries by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin confirmed that strawberries in a dream are a sign of good news. Whoever sees that he is eating strawberries will get rid of all the problems and worries that befall him. The sick person who sees strawberries inside the dream is a sign of recovery soon. Seeing strawberries planted in a dream is evidence of happy news that The dreamer will receive it. The person who sees in a dream that he is picking a large number of strawberries, this indicates the happiness and pleasure that he enjoys. The person who sees that he is unable to pick strawberries, this is an indication of the difficulties and fears he is falling into. The one who sees strawberries but is unable to catch them A man who sees strawberries in a dream indicates his marriage. If he can see inside a dream, green strawberries are a sign of goodness, blessings, and ample nourishment that will fall into it. Strawberries indicate Red indicates an abundance of goodness. A man who dreams that he is trading strawberries will win one coin. If he sees fresh strawberries, this indicates the arrival of goodness. Whoever sees black strawberries, this indicates some problems that he will face. If he sees that he cannot pick strawberries, this is good news for the arrival A mechanism that belongs to his lover. Black strawberries are a sign of anxiety. Yellow strawberries in a dream indicate that the dreamer has traveled for a long time and no one knows anything about him. Interpretation of seeing strawberries for single women. Strawberries in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she is close to marriage. Whoever sees in a dream that She gives strawberries to her lover, he will lose him. Interpretation of a dream about strawberries for a married woman. Red strawberries in a dream. Married / married announces the love of her husband and the justice of her children. Eating strawberries in a married woman’s dream indicates wealth and goodness. Strawberries are a sign of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about strawberries for a pregnant womanPregnant when she looks in a dream. Red strawberries indicate Indicates that she will give birth to a child of attractive beauty. The pregnant woman gains the ability to feed. Strawberries in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the safety of the child and the ease of childbirth that this pregnant woman will be exposed to, and the fetus will be healthy and in good health. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond. And we explain it

title: Interpretation of storytelling in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing a haircut in a dream is one of the visions that carries many different interpretations and has many meanings that vary depending on the psychological, health, and social circumstances of the dreamer. Seeing hair cut in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. When a person sees that he is cutting his hair in a dream and making a completely new hairstyle in the dream, this is a sign of the beginning of a new life in the person’s life, and the vision also shows many changes that he feels in his life. He thinks about his life and his life, as well as the beginning of new and good relationships in his life. Seeing someone in a dream forcefully cutting his hair, the vision shows that this person always feels limited and shows his constant feeling that he does not have the freedom to act and make decisions and shows that he rejects all these things and wants. To change it. If one sees hair in a dream, and the hair is very tangled in the dream, this is an indication that this person is going through many serious problems and crises in his life. Seeing someone in a dream who has short hair, in the dream is evidence that this person will lose all his money and possessions. It indicates that he will become poor, and it also indicates that he will be exposed to some psychological illnesses. Seeing someone in a dream that he takes care of his hair and taking care of it, in the dream is evidence that this dreamer will obtain a lot of money and it shows that he will acquire very large wealth and indicates that circumstances will change. For the better.To see someone in a dream that he cuts his hair completely, in the dream is a sign, in the dream it is an indication of the fortuneteller’s extraordinary generosity and that he gives his friends and those close to him what they want, and many interpreters see that cutting hair in this way in a dream indicates that You will have a very great opportunity. Seeing that you are cutting your hair, in the vision is evidence that someone close to his family is experiencing a very big problem and needs their help and support to overcome this crisis. Seeing someone cutting your hair when you are very sad indicates a feeling of discomfort And insecurity and it shows that you need someone who makes you feel supported and secure in your life. There are some other interpretations that say that whoever dreams of cutting his hair has experienced many traumas to the closest people in his life. If a person sees in a dream that his hair has suddenly become white, but his face is still young In a dream, the dreamer is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to a disastrous relationship and is exposed to loss, and if the girl is the girl. Whoever sees that her hair has become white in a dream, in the dream the dream indicates the loss of her lover due to death or that she was involved in an accident. Seeing hair cut in a dream for Nabulsi Imam Nabulsi believes that if a person dreams that he is cutting his hair, this indicates his disappointment and betrayal in some matter. When a person dreams that he is someone who cuts his hair and knows him, the dream shows the opinion’s desire to change many negative things in his life for the better and that he wants to get rid of everything. This is not good in his life. Seeing in a dream that someone is forcefully pulling his hair in a dream means that the dreamer is exposed to many financial crises and is exposed to...

title: Seeing someone doing laundry in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dead person performing ablution, performing ablution many times and then praying in a dream, is evidence of the dead person’s better status. Today, through the distinguished Mover website, we present the interpretation of this vision to the greatest scholars and interpreters of dreams in the Arab world. The interpretation of seeing someone washing clothes in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a single girl in a dream A person she does not know is performing ablution and praying in front of the house. This indicates the good news that the girl is waiting for soon. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a dead person praying in the mosque. Evidence of the good reputation and good morals that the girl has for everyone. The interpretation of seeing a person performing ablution and praying. With his family at home is evidence of a short relationship and a happy life. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing ablution and praying behind someone she does not know. The elements of marriage and the quiet life that you will enjoy, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing someone washing clothes. In a dream for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing someone I do not know performing ablution and praying in the cemetery. Evidence of breaking the torment and the end of troubles from this woman’s life in the near future. To see my husband performing ablution and then repeating the ablution and praying longer. Evidence of the marital stability and happiness that this woman is experiencing. Interpretation of the vision My dead father is still alive and performs ablutions often in a dream. It is good evidence for the dead person, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is performing ablution and repeats it. Then she prays and sleeps in the dream, it is evidence of fulfilling a wish and hearing happy news. The interpretation of seeing children washing in a married woman’s dream is evidence of good offspring. If A married woman saw in a dream that she was performing ablution with rain water and praying dawn. Evidence of a lot of money and comfort in married life. Interpretation of seeing someone bathing in a dream about a man and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a fellow traveler performing ablution and praying in the mosque suggests that you hear good news about insight. Also The interpretation of seeing repeated washing in a dream before a man prays is a sign of freedom from sadness and the end of confusion and anxiety. If a man sees in a dream his wife performing ablution and praying, and she is suffering from an illness, then this dream is evidence of recovery and he quickly recovered from that illness, and God knows best. For a married man to see in a dream that he performs ablution in his home, prays in congregation in the mosque, and then recites the Holy Qur’an, is evidence of trade and legitimate benefit for him. Seeing a dead father who is still alive, performing ablution and praying at home, is evidence of goodness and blessing in the dreamer’s life. Read also: Interpretation of church prayer in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of seeing a person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. The meaning of seeing a person performing ablution and repeating ablution many times in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of seeing a person performing ablution in the mosque for someone I do not know in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of Good offspring. Seeing my husband performing ablution and praying Fajr in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease of childbirth and that God Almighty will bless her with a male child. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is bathing and sleeping, this is a sign of good news and good life.

title: Interpretation of coal in a dream for a single woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: We present to you through the following article, through the Encyclopedia, the interpretation of coal in a dream for a single woman. It is this solid black substance composed of carbon with other elements in varying proportions, such as sulfur and nitrogen, which is found between the layers of the earth and is extracted by humans for use in many purposes, such as heating or barbecuing, and as it is, it is known by this name. It is also called coals when they are ignited and glowing, and one of their favorite uses in Muslim countries is to light incense. When one sees them in a person’s dream, they carry many meanings and connotations, which depend on many things, including whether they are extinguished or in a flaming state, and seeing them is not one of the common dreams that Often hesitates while rarely arriving. Thus, the dreamer makes whoever sees him suspicious and anxious, and we will present all the details of this dream in the following paragraphs, so follow us. Interpretation of charcoal in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says the following interpretations of this dream when he sees it for an unmarried girl: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing charcoal in a dream for an unmarried woman sometimes indicates To kindness and other times it means otherwise. The burning ember shows the extent of her desire to search for knowledge, and fortunately her desires in this regard will be satisfied by God’s will. This dream symbolizes the end of the rivalry and disputes that raged between them and people in the past and the return of better relations than before. Before. A lot of burning embers in her dream is good news about the progress of a young man with prestige and power, with whom she will marry and live a happy life with him, by God’s command. Interpretation of consuming black coal in a dreamIn the following points, we present the interpretation of charcoal in a dream for a single woman: Eating charcoal in a dream. The dream indicates eating an orphan’s money or forbidden money. This dream indicates that an unmarried woman will face problems and disputes in the coming period of her life. Eating coal never comes as a benign appearance because it can symbolize committing sins and it is necessary to repent and seek forgiveness from Almighty God. Interpretation Coal in the hand of single women: The following is an interpretation for a single woman dreaming of holding coal in her hand: It may indicate a quarrel and problems between her and one of her relatives. Holding a burning coal in her hand indicates the intensity of her desire to adhere to her religion and stay away from the path of strife. Holding the burning coal without causing pain The vision is good news for the acquisition of goodness and abundant wealth blessed by God’s command. Thus, we have reached the conclusion of our article in which we presented all the interpretations reported about the unmarried woman who sees charcoal or charcoal in a dream, according to what dream interpretation scholars, including the scholar Muhammad, dream about. Ibn Sirin, I mentioned, and it should be noted that despite the great effort they made in order to interpret everything seen in a dream, these visions are not based on confirmed evidence from Islamic law, so they cannot be taken for granted. To interpret another dream, you can log in through the direct dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of the appearance of gray hair in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the appearance of gray hair in a dream is different according to many scholars and interpreters, as some said that it indicates a person’s dignity and high wisdom, and some scholars said that it indicates the return of the absent, and through this reference you will explain the difference. Interpretations of the appearance of gray hair in a dream or a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream or a dream? Some scholars have varied in their interpretation as follows: The appearance of gray and white hair on a person’s head. The opinion indicates his long life, in addition to explaining wisdom, dignity and rationality in taking... Right and wise decisions in many matters. If the opinion is disturbed by seeing white hair, this is explained by a weak character and inability to think and decide on various life affairs. If a young man or someone in his youth sees in a dream white hair on his head, then he must abandon the door of disobedience and sins. He resorts to repentance and worship of God Almighty and seeks forgiveness for sins and transgressions. Sins that he committed in his real life. If a rich person sees in a dream that gray hair is widely spread on his head and in different parts of his body, this indicates a great financial loss, and that his financial situation will change a lot and he will have large financial debts. And the patient who sees gray hair in A dream or a dream is interpreted as the approach of death and that the white color is the shroud, but the ages are known only to God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that he is removing gray hair or white hair from his head, this indicates the return of someone who has been absent for a long time and many are waiting for his return. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin in a vision Gray hair in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision in which gray hair or white hair is on the head, with some of it appearing on the decoration in the dream, in reference to the abundance of nutrition that the dreamer will bring. If the man is married, God Almighty will bless him with two girls, as Ibn Sirin said. : White hair in a dream indicates wisdom, dignity and prestige in the eyes of a person. Ibn Shirin confirmed that white hair indicates a long and long life, and that the life of one’s opinion will be a happy and stable life full of happiness and joy. As for extreme whiteness and extreme grayness with the graying of the beard as well, this It indicates distress and poverty. As for Ibn Sirin’s opinion regarding the person who dreams of removing white hair from his beard, the interpretation of this is that the person does not respect the opinion of adults, especially those who address him regarding the teachings of religion and the necessity of adhering to them. Al-Osaimi’s interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream. Fahd Al-Osaimi interpreted seeing gray hair in a dream as a symbol of age and opinion, and that one will enjoy a long life and good health as well. But if the opinion is to remove gray hair from the head, this indicates that he is working in a job that he does not like, and is not satisfied with his work. And he is not satisfied with it. As for Al-Usaimi’s interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman with gray hair in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a daughter, and God is Greater and All-Knowing than ever. As for a man who dreams of dyeing his hair white in a dream, the interpretation of that is that he is looking for a new job opportunity. Is it possible? To be seeing poetry

title: Interpretation of the scene in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the scene in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the tent for unmarried people, for married women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether for the verse of poetry, about the entrance to the tent falling in the desert, and more for Al-Nabulsi and the imam. Al-Sadiq Ibn Sirin dreamed of seeing a tent. It is a country, and a merchant is a journey, and it is said that it indicates the injury of a beautiful virgin maid, according to the Almighty’s saying: “The poplars are cabins in a tent.” As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted the dream of a dream as a scene: it appears in the dream the journey, the grave, the wife or parents, and the many scenes are clouds. . If he sees a white tent in front of his tent, then this is a man who enjoins good and forbids evil and repents for a great sin. The green of the tents. It came to the famous work (Interpretation of Great Dreams) by Muhammad Ibn Sirin: The scene in a dream is guardianship and position or position and rule, and the scene in a merchant’s dream is travel and wandering and in some places from ancient times. Explanations. The tent in a man’s dream symbolizes a beautiful woman or a virgin, because God Almighty says in Surat Al-Waqiyya: “Hower cabins in tents.” A tent in a dream also indicates honor, power, or status, and in a woman’s dream, protection, vaccination, safety, and security. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of a tent. Whoever dreams of setting up a tent for himself or putting it up and sitting in it, if it is made of thorns, he will gain power and money, and if he is a merchant, he will gain money. And status. Of his travels, and if it is not mentioned, then it is interpreted as sadness and sorrow, and if it is violent and interrupted, then there will be damage and loss, and if the owner knows it, then he also tells him: The scene dreams about the Sultan increasing his command and the travel of the merchant, and perhaps it indicates the injury of a beautiful virgin maid, according to the Almighty’s words: Virtue He forbids evil, and seeing Fustat indicates visiting graves. Martyrs and praying for them, and perhaps some of the worldly witnesses were left behind, and perhaps he was granted a visit to Jerusalem. It was stated in the book (Signs in the Science of Phraseology): Whoever sees in his dream that a tent is pitched for him or sees that it is pitched for him, then he will obtain honor, money, and rule.. and after it he will profit. A tent sometimes indicates despair and distress if it is black or dark, and it is said to be sadness if it appears in a dream worn out or torn, and it is said: Whoever sees it torn up, it portends loss. Al-Dhaheri added: The scene in the sultan’s dream is an increase in his property and in the merchant’s dream an increase in his livelihood. Often The scene, according to Al-Dhahiri’s interpretation, refers to a beautiful woman, and almost all commentators agreed with him. As for whoever sees a scene in which a fire was set or surrounded him, if no evil touched him in the dream, the scene is interpreted by the sins of the person who repented. As for Al-Fustat in the dream, it indicates To visit the graves of martyrs and it is said that it refers to visiting holy places or pilgrimage. And whoever sees: hitting the tent at a land festival or in a weeping or in a kindergarten, it is interpreted as the grave of a martyr appearing in it. The tent in the dream is a shelter, so whoever is single and sees in his dream That he is hiding in a tent, the tent symbolizes a good wife. Stage If you dream that you are on a stage, it means that there will be changes in your affairs and work. If you see many scenes, it means a trip with hated companions. The tent in a man’s dream symbolizes a beautiful woman or a virgin, because God Almighty says in Surat Al-Waqiyya: “Hower cabins in tents.” A tent in a dream also indicates honor, power, or status, and in a woman’s dream, protection, vaccination, safety, and security. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about blood coming from the vagina of a woman married to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a married woman There is no doubt that seeing blood indicates anxiety and is undesirable for everyone, but we find that dreams are a very special world that tells us many things that happen to us and what we should do, so we find that this dream has many indications including the good news and others without it, which we will all understand through the interpretations of our honorable scholars during the article. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a married woman by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina of a married woman? Seeing it makes her feel tired and sad as a result of being exposed to harmful worries, but it will not continue, but rather it slowly disappears until it ends completely, and this gives her inner comfort. If the blood is very bad and she does not accept its smell, she should monitor her actions and avoid all the sins that she falls into during this period. The vision suggests that her life will change for the better in the future, and she will be happy and joyful with the wonderful news that she has been waiting for for a long time. The vision is considered one of the happy signs that indicate material recovery at this time, as it provides all the requirements for him and his children without any deficiency. If the blood is black, she should be optimistic about the disappearance of the worries that sadden her life, as Happiness and stability prevail. The unit includes the interpretation of dreams on the Egyptian website from Google, you can find many interpretations and questions from fans. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Our respected Imam Ibn Sirin tells us that this dream is evidence of the great comfort of the dreamer. If she is pregnant, she will give birth easily and easily, but if she feels tired during pregnancy, she will feel pain during childbirth, but there is no doubt that you will overcome it. The vision indicates that she has committed unjust acts and must stay away from them immediately and repent to her Lord at this time without returning. The vision suggests getting rid of crises and problems and reaching great comfort from the Lord of the Worlds and a blessing that the dreamer did not expect in her life. If the dreamer is going through a lot of debt, then this dream foretells her of the tremendous care that makes her pay all her debts without fail, as her husband's livelihood extends, thanks to God Almighty. The most important interpretations of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a married woman Interpretation of a dream about vaginal bleeding for a married woman This vision is not bad, but it shows the tremendous good that this woman enjoys and that she will be better off and live in prosperity as long as she has dreamed of with Her husband and children are like the vision indicates that a lot of profit will come as a result of the success of her projects, especially if she is really happy and does not suffer from any problems. However, if she is miserable and sad and her blood is contaminated, this indicates that she will be exposed to some difficulties that affect her future, which requires her to rush to pray and do good deeds to save herself from any distress. Interpretation of a dream of menstrual bleeding for a married woman Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood coming out for a married woman does not express evil, but rather is evidence of stability and comfort in her married life and her transition from any anxiety or pressure as she lives with her husband in comfort and luxury.

title: Seeing riding a car in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a single girl riding a car in a dream: A single girl sees herself riding a car with someone she knows in a dream. It is a sign of feeling safe and psychologically comfortable with this person. Seeing a single girl driving a car in a dream, and it was white. It is a sign that she is a nice and beautiful girl, and that Everyone loves her. And the only girl driving a red car in a dream. It is a sign of emotional attachment and attachment to the person she loves and wants to marry him. And only in case she saw herself getting into the car and driving with a stranger she did not know before, she was happy about it. It is a good omen for marriage From a respectable and righteous man in the near future. And when an unmarried girl sees herself in a black car in a dream. It is an indication of the problems she faces. Driving a green car in the dream of an unmarried girl, symbolizes kindness and nourishment. It also indicates the fortuneteller’s good condition and her success in her studies. Or her success in her work. As for seeing a single girl driving a yellow car, it is a symbol of illness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing herself riding a car in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees herself driving a luxury car in a dream. It indicates the stability of her married life, the luxury, and the wealth that She enjoys it. A married woman watches her as she gets into the car and drives herself vigorously while she sleeps. This is an indication that he has a strong personality and can bear responsibilities and burdens. Seeing a married woman driving a white car in a dream indicates the purity of her heart and intentions. Perhaps it symbolizes hearing the news of her long-awaited pregnancy. Waiting for him is an insight. Whether the black car in a dream is for a married woman and driving in it, symbolizes sadness and anguish. The married woman who dreams that she is riding a green car. It is a metaphor for joy, happiness and hearing good news. As for the married woman who dreams that she is driving a car driven by her husband. It is an expression A metaphor for her husband’s love, care, and concern for her. Interpretation of the vision of riding a car in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man dreams that he is riding in a car with an unknown woman whom he does not know. It symbolizes falling into a great ordeal that will lead him to great sadness. As for a married man who sees that he is riding a car, he will go out. From her in a dream. It is a metaphor for many problems, often with his wife. As for the married man who is watching his wife, he is the one driving the car that he drives. It symbolizes her love and faith in him. And the man who sees in his dream that he is riding a new car and he is happy with it. It is an indication of life. The new one that he will live. As for a man driving a spacious car in a dream, it is a metaphor for obtaining a promotion at work that will make him very happy. And if a man sees that he is driving a car with a famous woman in a dream. It shows that he will marry a beautiful woman who will stand out from others, and he will be very happy with her. Read also: Seeing someone driving a car in a dream. The meaning of seeing riding a car in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman dreams that she is driving a car and she is in the first months of pregnancy. It is a sign that she will give birth to a child.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman giving birth, the meaning of a pregnant woman giving birth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the birth of a boy or girl, not pregnant, unmarried, married, not pregnant, single, divorced, and more about Ibn Sirin. Birth in the dream of a married woman and in the dream of a pregnant woman, as well as in the dream of an unmarried and divorced woman, where the interpretation of a dream about childbirth varies according to the condition of the dreamer and the divorced woman. . Details of the dream, and each dream has its meanings and meanings, and we will explain the entire interpretation of the dream of birth in this article. Interpretation of the dream of birth by Ibn Sirin: If a man sees that he has given birth to a son, then he will fall ill and be saved from grief and triumph over his enemy. If a pregnant woman gives birth, then the child is a thief, and childbirth is a way out of adversity, illness, or separation from Family and neighbors, consolation for childbirth, relief, repayment of debt, and repentance. If a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth, then it is a healthy and safe birth for her, and if she is not pregnant, then she is pregnant. Whoever dreams of giving birth, if he is poor, will become wealthy. If he is wealthy, he will fall into hardship, and if he is single, he will marry quickly. If he sees a sick person That he gives birth, it indicates the death. Whoever sees that he has a daughter, he rides the debt. Whoever sees that his daughter died and he dug a grave for her. Seeing a person in a dream with a pregnant woman, it is interpreted by the name of the same person. For example, if you dream of a person like his name Yasser, this will be facilitated, God willing, for your birth, and this means that it will be Take the name and explain what will happen to you with the same meaning as the name. If a pregnant woman dreams of gold, she will give birth to a girl, God willing. A pregnant woman’s brother seeing everything that follows her, including shoes, clothes, headbands, and everything that belongs to her brother in her home or in her possession, means the birth of a child, God willing. A dream is interpreted A pregnant woman in her menstrual cycle is considered good, God willing, and it means that something different from what she hopes will happen to her. If a pregnant woman sees a man proposing to her, then the boy will be a boy. The dream of a pregnant woman who marries her mahrams or something similar to her sister’s husband and everyone pampers her, so the baby will be a girl. A pregnant woman dreams By marrying again to her husband while she is wearing a white dress, then the newborn will be a boy. When the king sees his wife giving birth to a fetus, then he will gain more wealth in reality. And if in the dream it is a male, then he will give birth to a female - in reality. And the opposite is true. Al-Nabulsi says: Giving birth to a girl is a relief in a dream, and a boy is for them. Seeing a sick woman giving birth in a dream means he dies. Seeing childbirth in a dream, and if you are poor, you will get rich, and if you are rich, you will fall into distress and hardship, and if you are single, you will get married. If a sick person sees that he is giving birth, then Indicates death: If a married woman dreams that she is giving birth to a child, this indicates overwhelming joy and a large inheritance. But if an unmarried woman dreams of this, it means losing virtue and abandoning her beloved. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIf the dreamer sees childbirth in his dream, it means that the dreamer will obtain food and offspring, just as childbirth in a dream shows that the dreamer will enjoy good health and whoever sees childbirth in his dream This indicates that things will happen. In the dreamer's life that will change his life in some way. In general, since the dream of childbirth indicates that the dreamer, after making an effort, will obtain a position or promotion at work, and seeing childbirth in the dream

And the opposite is true. Al-Nabulsi says: Giving birth to a girl is a relief in a dream, and a boy is for them. Seeing a sick woman giving birth in a dream means he dies. Seeing childbirth in a dream, and if you are poor, you will get rich, and if you are rich, you will fall into distress and hardship, and if you are single, you will get married. If a sick person sees that he is giving birth, then Indicates death: If a married woman dreams that she is giving birth to a child, this indicates overwhelming joy and a large inheritance. But if an unmarried woman dreams of this, it means losing virtue and abandoning her beloved. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIf the dreamer sees childbirth in his dream, it means that the dreamer will obtain food and offspring, just as childbirth in a dream shows that the dreamer will enjoy good health and whoever sees childbirth in his dream This indicates that things will happen. In the dreamer's life that will change his life in some way. In general, since the dream of childbirth indicates that the dreamer, after making an effort, will obtain a position or promotion at work, and seeing childbirth in the dream
